name: Running-horror-maze
description:
Welcome!

This is a two-player multiplayer game where the players compete to be the last one standing in the maze. The first player who has its timer run out is the loser for the round.  

Each player has 3 powers to either slow the opponent down or to boost themselves. These can be activated by using the number keys 1-3. You can also open a minimap with right-click to see where your opponent is located.

Note; The timer will count down faster if you slow down while running through the maze, so be sure to keep your speed up!
